typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{First Name} as string,
		{Last Name} as string,
		{Resource Name} as string,
		Group as string,
		Email as string,
		{Business unit} as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Date of birth} as date,
		{Job role} as string,
		SalaryGrid as string,
		Level as string,
		{Employment date} as date,
		{Parttime percentage} as string,
		Leadership as string,
		{Senior leadership} as string,
		Mentor as string,
		Evaluator as string,
		Country as string,
		DirectorTeam as string,
		{Director Leadership} as string,
		{Director Senior Leadership} as string,
		InUsers as string,
		EvInList as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EvolveMsFile
EvolveMsFile select(mapColumn(
		{First Name},
		{Last Name},
		{Resource Name},
		Group,
		Email,
		{Business unit},
		Gender,
		{Date of birth},
		{Job role},
		SalaryGrid,
		Level,
		{Employment date},
		{Parttime percentage},
		Leadership,
		{Senior leadership},
		Mentor,
		Evaluator,
		Country,
		DirectorTeam,
		{Director Leadership},
		{Director Senior Leadership},
		InUsers,
		EvInList
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select1
